message.msgid: Please click on OK to confirm that you want to connect to this AP!
AP MAC enteries are full! Please remove the MAC enteries you don't need.
message.msgstr: AP MAC地址条数已达最大值。请先移除您不需要的MAC地址。

message.msgid: Please enter the MAC address of your wireless device or correct unicast MAC address!
message.msgstr: 请输入您无线设备的MAC地址,或正确的单播MAC地址。

message.msgid: Please enter a different MAC address.
message.msgstr: 请输入一个不同的MAC地址。

message.msgid: Please enter a valid MAC address!
message.msgstr: 请输入一个有效的MAC地址。

message.msgid: AP MAC address field should not be left empty!

message.msgstr: 无线工作模式：网桥（中继模式）

message.msgid: SSID can not contain comma, semicolon, double quotation marks, ampersand, percent and backslash!
The SSID (network name) will be changed to %s! Please reconnect to the new SSID!
message.msgstr: SSID（无线信号名称）将被修改为%s!请重新连接新的SSID。

message.msgid: Secondary SSID is disabled! Devices connected to it will be unable to access the wireless network!
message.msgstr: 次SSID被禁用！已连接至次SSID的设备将不能上网。

message.msgid: Secondary SSID has been changed to %s! Please reconnect using the new SSID!
message.msgstr: 次SSID名称已被修改为%s！请重新连接新的SSID！
注意：您路由器的SSID和信道将会自动设置为所选AP的SSID和信道。所选AP也必须支持网桥(WDS)模式。为与所选AP兼容，建议使用WEP加密。

message.msgid: Warning: Can not create XMLHTTP example

message.msgstr: 请输入有效的密钥更新间隔。（60~9999）

message.msgid: Warning:Key renewal interval is too short,range
message.msgstr: 注意：密钥更新间隔太短，范围

message.msgid: Please enter a valid key renewal interval
message.msgstr: 请输入有效的密钥更新间隔。（60~9999）

message.msgid: The Pin code must be 8 decimal characters!
This feature can be used only if wireless is enabled.
message.msgstr: 无线功能未开启，此功能不可用。
WPS是一种比较简单的加密方式，帮助对无线加密了解不多的家庭用户建立安全的无线网络连接，避免输入冗长的无线密码或者进行复杂的设置。简单的使用路由器上的WPS按钮或者页面的PIN码或PBC按钮即可建立安全的无线连接。 WPS功能只能在以下安全模式下使用：不加密，WPA2-PSK 或 Mixed WPA/WPA2-PSK ，并且WPA加密规则为AES 或TKIP&AES 。
如果您选择了WEP或TKIP，网络模式将自动切换为11b/g混合模式。
如果您选择了AES或 TKIP&AES，网络模式将自动切换为11b/g/n混合模式。

message.msgid: WEP key %s is invalid! Please enter 5 or 13 ASCII characters.
message.msgstr: WEP密码%s无效！请输入5或13个 ASCII 码。

message.msgid: WEP key %s is invalid! Please enter 10 or 26 Hex characters.
message.msgstr: WEP密码%s无效！请输入10或26个 十六进制字符。

message.msgid: WEP key %s will be used for the wireless connection! Please reconnect to %s using the WEP key of %s!
message.msgstr: WEP密码%s将被设为新的无线密码！请用%s重新连接您的无线。

message.msgid: To configure a wireless security key, disable the WPS below!
message.msgstr: 设置无线密码之前，请先禁用WPS功能！

message.msgid: Are you sure to ignore the modification
You must set at least one rule when you choose Permit.
message.msgstr: 如果您选择“允许”，您必须设置至少一条规则。

message.msgid: Click on OK to confirm that you want to delete this MAC address.
Please enter a unicast MAC address!
Up to 16 MAC address entries are supported!

message.msgstr: 腾达多功能宽带SOHO路由器

message.msgid: Are you sure to connect to this AP?
Complete below settings to connect to WISP AP.
message.msgstr: 完成以下设置来连接WISP AP。

message.msgid: Complete below settings to connect to AP.
message.msgstr: 请完成以下设置以连接上级无线信号。
